dict.acceptation: 颜料，涂料；绘画作品；胭脂等化妆品；色彩，装饰；
涂色于；绘画；（用语言，文字等）描写；擦脂粉等；

sent.orig: Orange paint is a mix of red paint and yellow paint.
sent.trans: 橙色涂料是红色涂料和黄色涂料的混合物。

sent.orig: Which oil paint do you want, environmental oil paint or normal oil paint?
sent.trans: 油漆是用环保油漆？还是用普通油漆？

sent.orig: Translated Description: paints, nitrocellulose, CPVC paint, polyurethane floor paint, paint.
sent.trans: 油漆，硝基漆，过氯乙烯漆，聚氨酯地坪漆，涂料。

sent.orig: If left alone, paint contaminants will cause premature oxication or may etch the paint.
sent.trans: 如果不采取措施，油漆会过早氧化或被蚀刻。

sent.orig: As well as having strong views paint, the Academy also told artists about paint.
sent.trans: 学院不仅对创作的题材持不变的观点，而且对艺术家的技法也严格限制。
